startswith.help: Bot for locking voice channels to certain users. !lock, !unlock, !allow, !forbid. See !command for more detail.
startswith.command:
Commands:
```!lock 	Locks current channel to users in channel
!unlock	Deletes lock on current channel
!allow	*(@user/role)* : Allows role or user into channel
!forbid	*(@user/role)* : Forbids user from entering current channel
!locks	Lists current locks and allowed users/roles

!whoami	Lists your username and unique id
!whois	*(@user)* : Lists user's username and unique id

!maps <x>	Returns a list of <x> random CS:GO comp maps. Omit <x> to recieve a shuffled list of all comp maps

!roll <die>	Rolls a die of the given type and returns the result
!coinflip	Returns 'Heads' or 'Tails'
!roulette	Pulls the trigger on a revolver to your head.
!spin	Spins the barrel on a revolver
!gamble	see '!gamble help'
!bank	see '!gamble help'

!problem	Reports that there is problem with bot to Lukaus```
